name: Level One Enemy
description:
Controls

Left Joystick
The left joystick determines the direction of your jumps. (The further this goes determines the flat distance you will travel as well.)

Right Joystick
The right joystick determines the power you put into the jump. Release the joystick to perform a jump. (This only reads the Y level of the joystick and going negative will do nothing. The power can be thought of as a multiplier to your jump direction
